text.プチプラお手入れグッズに挑戦中: Currently trying out \nlow price care products
text.妹たちにいじられ慣れ、掴まれても驚かない:
Used to being played with 
by her sisters, she's 
never surprised when it 
gets grabbed.
text.真夏も熱いお湯で洗うのが粋なこだわり:
Washing it with hot water 
even in the middle of 
summer is a chic 
obsession.
text.走りに適した長さと毛量を計算し、維持中:
She calculates and 
maintains the appropriate 
length and hair volume 
for efficient running.
text.海外で披露できるよう尻尾習字を習得済み: Learned callipgraphy \nwith her tail to perform \ninternationally
text.朝起きるとよだれがついていることがある: Often has drool on it \nwhen she wakes up
text.手懐けようとした黒猫に玩具扱いされている: The black cat she tried \nto tame is treating it \nlike a toy.
text.人ごみだと緊張して微動だにしない: In crowds, they get \nnervous and don't \nmove an inch.
text.賭け事の際は尻尾の動きをブラフに使う: Uses her tail movements \nas a bluff when gambling
text.太陽と、四季折々の花の香りがする: It smells like the sun \nand the scent of flowers \nin each season.
text.とりあえず尻尾も毎日鍛えている: She disciplines her tail \nevery day too.
text.悩むといじる癖があるので、よく絡む:
She has a habit of 
fiddling with it when 
distressed, so it gets 
tangled up a lot.
text.ブランド物より毛質に合うアイテムを愛用中: She prefers products that \nsuit her hair type rather \nthan brand name products.
text.夜中にこっそり手入れしている: She takes care of it in \nthe middle of the night \nin secret.
text.他人の脚をくすぐって笑わせることがある: It sometimes tickles \nother people's legs to \nmake them laugh.
text.いつメンとハートマーク作って撮るのエモい: Loves making heart \nshapes with her friends \nfor photos
text.落ち着きなく、あっちこっちフラフラ: Wags all over the place, \nnever staying still
text.尻尾でも重たいものが持てる: Even her tail can hold \nheavy things.
text.マルゼンスキーと同じオイルでケアしている: Tended to with the same \noil that Maruzensky uses.
text.特注のオーガニックトリートメントを愛用: She loves to use a \ncustom-made organic \ntreatment.
text.飛来してきたものを叩き落せるほど強靭: It's strong enough to \nknock down flying objects.
text.おしりに敷いてもあんまり気づかない: She doesn't really \nnotice it when it \nlays on her hips.
text.母そっくりの毛質で、とてもふわふわ: The hair is very fluffy, \njust like her mom's.
text.概念に抗え――（※尻尾でも柵を壊したい）: Reject convention―― \n(※ Has a desire to destroy fences)
text.毛先は自然と高貴な形に巻いている: The hairtips naturally curl \nthemselves into classy shapes
text.グッズ化したときに映えるアレンジを模索中: Looking for a style that \nwill look good in merch
text.その日の吉方位に向かってパタパタしがち: It tends to flutter \ntowards the luckiest \ndirection of the day.
text.触られそうでも華麗にかわす: Elegantly slips away from \nany touching attempts
text.調子が悪いと“ダストテイル”になるらしい: Apparently turns into a dust tail \nwhen she feels down
text.染めてみるか…と思ったことだけはある: She has found herself thinking \n"Maybe I should dye it..."
